UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Vipericidins: a novel family of cathelicidin-related peptides from the venom gland of South American pit vipers.
Literature.Author: Rádis-Baptista G, Andreu D, Barron AE, Pérez-Peinado C, de la Torre BG, Falcao CB

Literature.Title: Mechanistic Insights into the Leishmanicidal and Bactericidal Activities of Batroxicidin, a Cathelicidin-Related Peptide from a South American Viper ( Bothrops atrox).
Literature.Author: Dematei A, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=12.5 µM,Murine macrophage cells J774:50% Cytotoxicity=1.6±0.11 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cytotoxicity=21.74±4.83 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.48µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.94µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=7.51µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=7.51µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=7.51µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=0.94µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.94µM),Leishmania amazonensis MHOM/BR/73/M2269(EC50=4.9±0.78µM)
